channel.title: Psoriasis Cure Now Podcasts
channel.description: The latest info on psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis treatments, research, and coping strategies, including interviews with leading experts.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2006-7 Psoriasis Cure Now/Framers Institute, Inc.
channel.itunes:author: Psoriasis Cure Now
channel.itunes:summary: Psoriasis Cure Now Podcasts: the latest on psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis treatments, cutting-edge research, and coping strategies. Includes interviews with top experts and segments on the media's portrayal of psoriasis.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Psoriasis Cure Now latest psoriasis treatment and research news

item.title: Psoriasis Podcast - Tim Gunn interview - AddressPsoriasis
item.description: An interview with style guru Tim Gunn and Dr. Susan Taylor about the Addressing Psoriasis (TM) campaign and contest.
item.itunes:author: Psoriasis Cure Now
item.itunes:summary: An interview with style guru Tim Gunn and Dr. Susan Taylor about the Addressing Psoriasis (TM) campaign and contest.

item.title: How to Win the Psoriasis Cure Now Video Contest $7,500 Prize
item.description: In this podcast, we interview David Straus, CEO of Withoutabox, Inc., who shares his tips and strategies for creating compelling short films, including for the $7,500 Grand Prize in the Psoriasis Cure Now Video Contest, which is accepting submissions through September 26, 2007 at www.psoriasis-cure-now.org/contest . Withoutabox helps connect filmmakers and film audiences worldwide.
item.itunes:author: Psoriasis Cure Now
item.itunes:summary: In this podcast, we interview David Straus, CEO of Withoutabox, Inc., who shares his tips and strategies for creating compelling short films, including for the $7,500 Grand Prize in the Psoriasis Cure Now Video Contest, which is accepting submissions through September 26, 2007 at www.psoriasis-cure-now.org/contest . Withoutabox helps connect filmmakers and film audiences worldwide.

item.title: Psoriasis Podcast - Doctor-Patient Communication - No. 7
item.description: In this podcast, dermatologist Laurence H. Miller, MD discusses doctor-patient communication. What should a doctor be asking a psoriasis patient, and what should psoriasis patients be telling their physicians? You will learn strategies for getting the most out of your doctor visits, and you will gain insights into how a top psoriasis doctor approaches treatment of this disease.
item.itunes:author: Psoriasis Cure Now

item.title: Psoriasis Cure Now Podcast - the documentary film InnerState
item.description: This podcast discusses a new documentary film called InnerState, which chronicles the life of three people battling chronic diseases, including psoriasis. The podcast includes an interview with the director of InnerState, and the psoriasis patient who stars in the film. The podcast is produced by Psoriasis Cure Now, a nonprofit patient advocacy group.
item.itunes:author: Psoriasis Cure Now
item.itunes:summary: This podcast discusses a new documentary film called InnerState, which chronicles the life of three people battling chronic diseases, including psoriasis. The podcast includes an interview with the director of InnerState, and the psoriasis patient who stars in the film. The podcast is produced by Psoriasis Cure Now, a nonprofit patient advocacy group.

item.title: Psoriasis Cure Now - Remicade for Psoriasis
item.description: This episode includes a pair of interviews to help patients learn about Remicade, a biologic therapy recently approved by the FDA for severe psoriasis. Alan Menter, M.D., Chairman of the Division of Dermatology at Baylor University Medical Center and a renowned dermatologist, discusses Remicade's efficacy and safety profile; and Mike Hills, a Remicade patient, shares his experience with Remicade and explains a Remicade infusion from a patient perspective. The music is by famed pianist and psoriatic arthritis patient Byron Janis.
item.itunes:author: Psoriasis Cure Now

The music is by famed pianist and psoriatic arthritis patient Byron Janis.

item.title: Psoriasis Cure Now - Treating Children with Psoriasis
item.description: An interview with Amy Paller, MD, a leading pediatric dermatologist, discussing treatment strategies for children, and what to tell teachers about psoriasis as kids head back to school. The podcast also reviews a children's book called "Oh Yuck!" and plays an excerpt of a song by singer-songwriter Kevin Burdick.

item.title: Psoriasis Podcast - The biologics breakthrough
item.description: A discussion of the exciting new biologic psoriasis treatments with Ivor Caro, M.D., of Genentech; reviews of two recent books that depict psoriasis; and a song excerpt by Nik Everett, singer-songwriter and psoriasis patient.
item.itunes:author: Psoriasis Cure Now
item.itunes:summary: A discussion of the exciting new biologic psoriasis treatments with Ivor Caro, M.D., of Genentech; reviews of two recent books that depict psoriasis; and a song excerpt by Nik Everett, singer-songwriter and psoriasis patient.

item.title: Psoriasis Cure Now - The Future of Psoriasis Treatments
item.description: This first ever Psoriasis Podcast includes an interview with Steven Feldman, MD PhD of Wake Forest, focused on the future of psoriasis treatments over the next 5-20 years; an update on our effort to have Google stop running ads for phony miracle 'cures' for psoriasis; and an excerpt from Scott Walker's new song, Psoriatic. Hosted by the president of Psoriasis Cure Now, a nonprofit patient advocacy group.
